page.title: 14MEDICAL SERVICES & POLICE
page.content: The{Doctors' Surgery}is situated at Old Church Farm. There are two doctors, Dr.Parr and Dr.Linsey. They cover several villages in the area, and dispense medicine from the surgery. Dr Parr and his family live at the Old Church Farm. The{Dental Surgery}is in Utopia House in the High Street. It is open only two or three days a week. It is run by Mrs.Sivyer. The{Clinic}for pre school children is held on alternate Thursdays in the Village Hall. Medical Inspections and Dental Treatment (for those who want it) are carried out at the school from time to time. The{Village Policeman,}P.C.Pearl, lives in the Police House with his family. P.C.Pearl is also the{Mace {Bearer}for the Mayor of Romsey.
